Reviews.Title: Excellent Condition and Exceptionally High Volume
Reviews.Author: Paul W
Reviews.Content: This review is for a used Samsung Sch U540 that I bought from ReCellulartoo. This is a replacement for the identical phone that I have had for about five years. I have significant hearing loss and I have not been able to find a more featured model with the same high volume level and sound quality than my original Samsung U540 that I could use on the Verizon network. Very Frustrating. I looked at IPhones, Androids, etc. but the volume is not as loud as this ancient phone. So, I bought two used phones hoping that one would work. Surprise: they both work; the sound quality and volume are the same as the original and I am a happy camper!The phones do not come with an owners manual but they are available for download on the Web. Verizon activated one phone for me with no difficulty and now I have a spare!

Reviews.Title: Great product but aged
Reviews.Author: Curly Blue
Reviews.Content: This is a fine phone.  But I had to return it to the vendor.  It was used (which I knew before buying).  However, the asking price was too great for the amount of  wear and tear the previous owner(s) had done to the unit.The company was great shipping was fast and I had no problems with the returns and refund

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: skylanegirl
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to replace a phone my grown daughter lost.  She is happy with it, except it is too old a model to be able to have her phone numbers backed up on it with auto backup.  That was dissappointing and a hassel for her, but she likes the phone otherwise.  We only use the phone as a phone, no texting or web is on our service.

Reviews.Title: Is new and refurbish phone are the same?
Reviews.Author: Chun  J Chen
Reviews.Content: I mean when I got a new phone it came with the original box that contain charger, battery, the instruction booklet and the warranty paper, but this order that I got it had the battery charger and the phone which isn't in its original box.  I know I shouldn't complain about it because you get what you pay.  But when I order it said NEW PHONE so to my understanding that a NEW phone means its in the original box.  When its refurbish phone just say it's a refurbish phone that way people know what they are getting.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone, Good Value
Reviews.Author: Roy Prescott "Roy"
Reviews.Content: Nice purchase for someone not in need of a smart phone.  It also has good text features and a hugh selection of blue tooth device connections.

Reviews.Title: Miserable battery life!
Reviews.Author: Kenneth A Colcord
Reviews.Content: Goes dead after six hours of idle time. Purchase two extra batteries, same outcome. I would not recommend this phone.

Reviews.Title: Faulty battery!
Reviews.Author: Darouny Vongphachanh
Reviews.Content: The phone itself appeared to be off good quality however the battery is loose. I actually have the batter taped onto the phone for it to stay powered on!!

Reviews.Title: I love Samsung Cell Phones
Reviews.Author: Linda Collison
Reviews.Content: I had previously owned this particular cell phone and it worked great until my Great Dane puppy decided to sharpen his teeth on it.  I was surprised that I could still purchase the old 'clam shell' type phone but there it was.  I have no interested at this time in texting so this cell phone is perfect for me.  I worry that if something happens to this one, there may not be anymore to purchase.

Reviews.Title: great little phone
Reviews.Author: mamatrier
Reviews.Content: Would recommend for anyone who doesn't want a so-called smart phone.  It works great, does blue-tooth just fine.  Lots of features available - all I want is a reliable "hello-goodbye."  This phone does the job.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Verizon Phone
Reviews.Author: Dave Schwantes
Reviews.Content: I just bought it because I had the same phone and lost it.  When my contract is up I will upgrade.

Reviews.Title: Reliable low-tech.
Reviews.Author: Ray Gunhouse
Reviews.Content: This is a very old type of cellphone, It was chosen to help someone non technical and does a good job at that.

Reviews.Title: Unreliable
Reviews.Author: Monico Ortiz "Monty O"
Reviews.Content: It worked for a few days then it started "turning itself off". Every time my wife went to use it would be off, so she would turn it on and use it. Now when we try to turn it on "it starts its self intiation" but it never fully turns on. Right now we can not use the phone at all.What recourse do we have.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy anything from this seller!!!!
Reviews.Author: scarlett
Reviews.Content: The phone was stated as in excellent condition and never used. Every time you closed the phone too hard and touched two buttons at once it would turn off and you had to remove the battery to be able to turn it back on. Do not buy anything from this seller unless you want something that only half works.

Reviews.Title: Battery don't fit we'll
Reviews.Author: Loving It
Reviews.Content: If my son wouldn't be completely out of a phone, I would return this phone. The battery keeps falling out.

Reviews.Title: The battery cover is thicker than on my old 540
Reviews.Author: T. Burris
Reviews.Content: I just received this SCH-U540 from amazon seller DEALSCALY and I'm very happy.  I bought it to replace my old u540 which had a couple buttons die after 5 years.  My only complaint is that the battery cover on this new phone is quite a bit thicker, possibly to accommodate an extended life battery which was not included.  No problem, i put my old battery cover on the new phone and i'm in HEAVEN! BTW i'm 27yrs old and flip phones are still the only way to go for me.

Reviews.Title: It's a P.O.S. from this seller!
Reviews.Author: jeff walter
Reviews.Content: the damn thing can't be activated. have to take it miles away to be " flashed by Verizon". picks up us cellular just fine. can you say SCREWING ?
